page.title: 07THE LYCH GATE
page.content: The once flourishing parish of{St. {John's}Anglican mission of {Haverton {Hill}is gone.All that remains of the church,the house and the church hall is a beautiful{lych gate}and graveyard. Walk through the gate and the roaring of the incessant commercial traffic is left behind.The grass between the gravestones is cut,bright yellow stonecrop thrives untended and a few rose bushes bloom bravely. Wandering among the graves and reading the names and dates from the mid 1800's to the late 1970's a sad picture of the life and death of {Haverton}is revealed. Looking up we are returned to the derelict and deserted factories and sheds that reflect{Haverton}in 1985.
